sentences.english: This would forever settle many minds that were now in uncertainty.
sentences.chinese: 这就会使许多人心中的闷葫芦打破了。

sentences.english: My English grandma saw my mum plant so many courgette and thought it was a bit strange.
sentences.chinese: 我奶奶见我妈种那么多西葫芦，觉得奇怪。

sentences.english: The mostly of molybdenum mine are concentrated at the Gangtun town of Lianshan District in Holudao city.
sentences.chinese: 而钼矿主要集中在葫芦岛市连山区钢屯镇。

sentences.english: Chain hoist is a kind of gourd.
sentences.chinese: 环链葫芦是葫芦的一种。

sentences.english: Chain hoist is a kind of gourd.
sentences.chinese: 环链葫芦是葫芦的一种。

sentences.english: Hanging a gourd on the wall next to your front door is thought to bring wealth and fortune.
sentences.chinese: 在大门口旁可以挂上一个葫芦，一般认为可招财纳福。

sentences.english: This machine is called Kito chain hoists.
sentences.chinese: 这种机器叫鬼头手拉葫芦。

sentences.english: Before his venture into carving gourds he designed and made furniture and cabinets.
sentences.chinese: 在进行葫芦雕刻之前，他设计和只做家具和橱柜。

sentences.english: The courgette struck the bear on the head, scaring it away
sentences.chinese: 这就是击中黑熊头部，并把它吓跑的西葫芦。

sentences.english: The three pools actually refer to the three gourd-shaped stupas in the lake.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，“三潭”即是指湖中呈葫芦状的三塔。

sentences.english: Yang Shulin is a gourd pyrography artist in Shijingshan District.
sentences.chinese: 杨淑林，现居石景山区，葫芦烙画艺人。

sentences.english: Buda put a bamboo into a golden gourd and give it to little hat.
sentences.chinese: 佛祖把竹管插入金葫芦，送给勇敢的小卜冒。

sentences.english: Cantaloup is belonged to cucurbitaceous, a year of rampant herb.
sentences.chinese: 香瓜属葫芦科，一年蔓生草本植物。

sentences.english: Don Juan contorted his face again into a devilish grin and said that the young man declared that he wanted to have the gourds.
sentences.chinese: 唐望扭曲成邪恶的脸孔说，年轻人宣布他决定要葫芦。

sentences.english: Shed can be used throughout the climb has been hanging electric hoist to the ground and then demolished.
sentences.chinese: 整个爬棚可以用电动葫芦一直吊到地面再拆卸。

sentences.english: Harp and her husband, Nick, grow the giant gourds on their family farm.
sentences.chinese: 哈伯和她的丈夫尼克，在他们的家庭农场里种大葫芦。
